simple.gui

Class Widget

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.gui.Widget

  • public abstract class Widget
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic Widget class. All widgets inherit from this class. Note that if you decide to make your own Widget object, they have access to a DrawObject named draw. Drawing should be done with this object.
    Author:
    Austin
